name: Bubbles
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pop bubbles
Developer Terms of Use
des: Bubbles is a playful, touch-interactive Alexa skill that lets users virtually pop bubbles for relaxation, stress relief, or fun. With sound and visuals, Bubbles makes popping bubbles feel real and satisfying, with each pop bringing a small burst of joy. Ideal for anyone, this skill can offer a few minutes of relaxing fun or be part of a wind-down routine. This skill is compatible only with devices with screens that support APL. Users can simply say "Alexa, pop bubbles" to invoke the skill. Premium scenes and bubble motion are available for purchase. This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
